import React from "react"; import app from "../App"; import { ReactComponent as MySVG1 } from '../images/icons/icon-1.svg'; import UmbrellaIcon from '../images/icon-umberella.png'; import WindIcon from '../images/icon-wind.png'; import CompassIcon from '../images/icon-compass.png'; import icon3 from '../images/icons/icon-3.svg'; import icon4 from '../images/icons/icon-5.svg'; import icon5 from '../images/icons/icon-7.svg'; import icon6 from '../images/icons/icon-12.svg'; import icon7 from '../images/icons/icon-13.svg'; import icon8 from '../images/icons/icon-14.svg'; const windDirection = app.getWindDirections(53) console.log(windDirection) const monthNames = [ "January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June", "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December" ]; const today = new Date(); const hour = today.getHours().toString().padStart(2, '0'); const min = today.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2, '0'); const day = today.getDate(); const year = today.getFullYear(); const monthIndex = today.getMonth(); const formattedDate1 = day + " " + monthNames[monthIndex]; const formattedDate2 = day + " " + monthNames[monthIndex] + " " + hour + ":" + min; const formattedDate3 = year; function Forecast() { const today = new Date() const currentDayIndex = today.getDay() const week = ['Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thrusday', 'Friday', 'Saturday'] return (
{week[currentDayIndex]}
{formattedDate1}
Moldova
23 o C
22%
18km/h
East
{week[(currentDayIndex + 1) % 7]}
25 o C
25 o C
{week[(currentDayIndex + 2) % 7]}
25 o C
25 o C
{week[(currentDayIndex + 3) % 7]}
25 o C
25 o C
{week[(currentDayIndex + 4) % 7]}
25 o C
25 o C
{week[(currentDayIndex + 5) % 7]}
25 o C
25 o C
{week[(currentDayIndex + 6) % 7]}
25 o C
25 o C
) } export default Forecast; export { formattedDate1, formattedDate2, formattedDate3};
